alert.note: Alert for Lake (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 18 at 3:52AM EST until December 18 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Lake IN County. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Travel may be difficult for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur along the Lake Michigan shore and a few miles inland. Scattered snow showers in the morning along with the strong winds may result in sharply reduced visibility at times.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
